title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password, and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated, session is started, and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User login with invalid credentials
description: Verify the login attempt fails when incorrect username or password is provided, and the user receives a relevant error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid username or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and an error message is shown.

title: User logout functionality
description: Ensure the user can successfully log out and session is properly cleared, redirecting them back to the login page.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Click the logout button.
Verify the user session is cleared and user is redirected to login page.

title: Dashboard displays accurate analytics
description: Verify the dashboard shows correct and up-to-date analytics and management views after user login.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify analytics data is loaded and displayed accurately.

title: Inventory CRUD operations
description: Test create, read, update, and delete operations for inventory items through modals.

steps.description: Navigate to the Inventory page.
Open the add inventory modal and create a new inventory item with valid data.
Verify the new inventory item appears correctly in the inventory list.
Select an existing inventory item and open the edit modal; update fields with valid changes.
Verify the inventory item is updated accordingly.
Delete an existing inventory item.
Verify the item is removed from the inventory list.

title: Product CRUD operations
description: Verify creation, reading, updating, and deletion of product entries via product modal dialogs.

steps.description: Navigate to Products page.
Open the add product modal and add a new product with valid details.
Confirm the new product is listed correctly.
Open edit modal for an existing product and update its details.
Confirm the product details are updated in the list.
Delete a product from the list.
Verify the product is no longer present.

title: Pharmacy management workflows
description: Ensure pharmacy-specific features such as adding, updating, and deleting pharmacy data work correctly through the pharmacy modal and page.

steps.description: Navigate to the Pharmacy page.
Open the Pharmacy modal to create a new pharmacy record with valid inputs.
Verify the pharmacy entry is added to the list.
Edit an existing pharmacy entry using the modal and save changes.
Confirm the changes are reflected correctly.
Delete a pharmacy record.
Verify the record is removed from the list.

title: Investment management view and data handling
description: Validate that the investments page displays correct data and allows managing investments with expected behaviors.

steps.description: Navigate to the Investments page.
Check the investment data is retrieved and displayed correctly.
Perform add, update, and delete operations on investments (if applicable).
Verify investment data changes are saved and reflected accurately.

title: OCR functionality produces correct text recognition
description: Verify that the OCR page correctly processes images and returns accurate recognized text results.

steps.description: Navigate to the OCR page.
Upload an image with clear and legible text.
Check the recognized text matches the content of the image.
Upload an image with low quality or partial text.
Verify the system handles partial or poor quality text gracefully without crashing.

title: Reusable UI components respond correctly across pages
description: Validate that modals, form fields, menus, and other reusable UI components behave consistently and correctly on all pages and screen sizes.

steps.description: Navigate through different pages such as Dashboard, Inventory, Products, Pharmacy, Investments, and OCR.
Open modals and interact with form fields and menus.
Verify consistent styling, correct functionality, and proper responsiveness on desktop and mobile screen sizes.

title: API service layer handles invalid responses gracefully
description: Confirm that when the backend API returns errors or unexpected responses, the frontend handles these errors without crashing and informs the user appropriately.

steps.description: Simulate API error responses for actions like login, CRUD operations, and data fetching.
Verify the application shows meaningful error messages and remains stable.

title: Session expiration handling
description: Test that when a user session expires, the app logs the user out and prompts them to log in again.

steps.description: Login successfully and let the session expire or simulate session timeout.
Try to perform an action requiring authentication.
Verify the user is redirected to the login page with a session expired message.

title: Input validation for forms in modals
description: Verify that input forms used in modals for Inventory, Product, and Pharmacy management enforce validation rules and show correct error messages for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Open any creation or edit modal.
Leave required fields blank or enter invalid data formats.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify the form does not submit and validation error messages are displayed.
